<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/area/{id}/child/{childId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This creates a new Parent Area

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

>
